search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Productive.io (productiveio.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Productive.io can be found at: [https://productive.io/pricing](https://productive.io/pricing).

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

Haven’t found what you’re looking for?

Contact us

Is there a minimum number of users I can add in Productive?

The minimum number of users in a Productive account is one user.

Is there a limit to the number of projects, tasks, clients and budgets we can add in Productive?

No, there are no limits to projects, tasks, clients, or budgets in Productive—you only pay for your employees and contractors that use it.

I want to invite my clients to Productive, do I need to buy seats for them, too?

No, you will not be charged additional fees for clients. Adding clients to Productive is free of charge. You can invite them to your projects and make communication easier and more organized while also giving them the ability to check out progress in real time.

Can I invite freelancers or contractors to Productive?

Yes, you can add them, they’ll be able to collaborate with you and track time on projects. They’ll be charged the same price as employees.

Can I pay by invoice?

If you’d like to pay by wire transfer, this option is available for annual subscriptions. However, you need to place a minimum order of 10 user seats to pay by wire transfer. Send an email to [contact@productive.io](mailto:contact@staging.productive.io) for more information.

Do you have discounts for education, nonprofits or charities?

We believe in giving back. That’s why we give free accounts to teachers and students. Non-profits and charities also get 50% off on all subscriptions. Contact us to learn more.

What happens to my credit card information?

We don’t store your credit info nor do your credit card numbers pass through our servers at any time. We use [Stripe](https://stripe.com/) as our credit card processor. Card information storage, transmission, and processing are completely PCI-Compliant. Every transaction is processed with the same high-level secure encryption just as in a bank.

I have other questions! Who can help me?

Our support team (not robots) is at your disposal to answer any questions you might have. Contact them via the help bubble inside Productive or at [sales@productive.io](mailto:sales@productive.io).

**Optimize Operations** With Productive
---------------------------------------

Switch from multiple tools and spreadsheets to one scalable professional services platform.

Free 14-day trial. Cancel anytime.

Start free trial
